item.title: [Simperby] Implement Double Vote Checks in Vetomint
item.description:
Feature Description

Implemented check_double_prevote and check_double_precommit functions in the Vetomint consensus module. These checks are crucial for preventing double-voting misbehaviors, enhancing the security and stability of the consensus mechanism.

View on GitHub
